description: Object containing information about the previous calculation to the retrieved tax calculation.

calculationTimestamp.description: The timestamp of the previous calculation. in ISO 8601 UTC format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ

calculationId.description: The unique identifier of the calculation.

totalIncomeTaxAndNicsDue.description: Total Income Tax and National Insurance Contributions (NICs) due in the previous calculation. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

cgtTaxDue.description: The Capital Gains Tax (CGT) due in the previous calculation. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalIncomeTaxAndNicsAndCgtDue.description: Total Income Tax, NICs and CGT due in the previous calculation. This is the sum of cgtTaxDue and totalIncomeTaxAndNicsDue. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

incomeTaxNicDueThisPeriod.description: The Income Tax and NICs due. The difference between this calculation and the previous calculation. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

cgtDueThisPeriod.description: The Capital Gains Tax due. The difference between this calculation and the previous calculation. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalIncomeTaxAndNicsAndCgtDueThisPeriod.description: Total Income Tax, NICS, and CGT due this period. This is the sum of cgtDueThisPeriod and incomeTaxNicDueThisPeriod. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
